string.name: desc
string.value: This Teleport Rock enables one to #cteleport between continents#. It also enables the user to teleport to a specific character from the same channel. Up to #c10# maps, excluding the maps that cannot be reached through teleport, can be registered for this.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this coupon to move directly to quest NPC to complete the quest. Only available when quest is ready to be completed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this coupon to move directly to quest NPC to complete the quest. Only available when quest is ready to be completed.

string.name: desc
string.value: This #cscroll allows you to move 1 AP from one stat to another#. The lowest AP level that a stat can have is 5.

string.name: desc
string.value: This #cscroll allows you to move 1 SP from one 1st job advancement skill to another#. Dual Blades can move 1st job SP to 1st and 1+ skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cAllows you to remove 1 SP from a 2nd job skill and place it in another#. If you put the SP into a 1st job skill after taking your 2nd job advancement, you can also move that. Dual Blades can move 1+ and 2nd job advancement skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cAllows you to remove 1 SP from a 3rd job skill and place it in another#. If you put the SP into a 1st or 2nd job skill after taking your 3rd job advancement, you can also move that. Dual Blades can move 2+ and 3rd job advancement skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 4th-level skill#. The 1st, 2nd, and 3rd job SP raised AFTER the 4th job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st, 2nd or 3rd job skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: Only for Evan. This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 1st or 2nd Job Skill.#

Double click the Sealing Lock and place the item in the seal. The seal will be automatically released in 7 days and it will be intact before then.

string.name: desc
string.value: This lock allows one to seal up an equipment item or throwing stars that aren't quest items, which will #cdisable the item from being sold, traded, dropped, or engage in any other form of transaction#. Double-click the lock to open up a window, and place the item inside to seal it up. #cThe seal will be destroyed after 365 days, but it will not break before that.#

string.value: Mysterious water collected from a deep place in Ellinia. If you take it to Mar the Fairy in Ellinia, you can revive a pet that turned into a doll. You cannot use it on a #cMiracle Pet# without magic duration time.

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds the item pick-up skill to a pet. \n#cAvailable to pets that can only pick up Mesos.#

string.value: Adds to automatic potion-feeding skill to the pet. \n#cAvailable to all pets that do not have this option.#

string.name: desc

string.value: (+) Pick up Leftover Item & Meso Skills

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds the skill that enables pets to pick up mesos and items that have been dropped for more than 30 seconds, thus rendering it as leftovers.\n#cAvailable to pets that have Meso pick-up skills as well as item pick-up skills.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The skill that makes pet not picking up any selected item. \n#s only pet mounted meso or item collecting function can use the skill.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The skill that automatically recharges one's MP provided you have set the option up in the system option. \n#c The skill applies to all pet that does not have the skillt#.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

#c*Warning: If you do not have an empty Character slot, it cannot be used.#

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world. You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status.#

You can lock the current configuration for up to 365 days max by using more Super Cosmic Dust Solidifier. \r\n#cWarning: The stat lock will be overwritten if you use an item to reconfigure the Core's stats.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Sprinkle some of this dust on Jett's Core to randomly reconfigure its stats to become more powerful. If Jett is at least Lv. 120 and the Core has been completed, this dust also has a chance to increase stat ranks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sprinkle some of this dust on Jett's Core to reconfigure its stats to the highest possible. This dust will not affect stat ranks.

string.name: desc
string.value: 甕子中裝有曾經被女媧用來創造世人的神奇白土。在寶盒灑上女媧的白土會設定為最高等級的能力值。俠客等級達120且當寶盒的八卦是陽卦的話，也不會調整等級。

string.name: desc
string.value: Rotates the Core's stat distribution clockwise once.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: This item enables you to fuse #cEquipment items of the same kind (gender)# to change their #cAppearance#. The resulting item's effects are determined by the Function item. Fusing items with the same Appearance results in the same appearance. \nFusible Equipment Types: Total 12 - Hat, Eye Accessory, Face Accessory, Top, Bottoms, Overall, Shoes, Gloves, Cape, Weapon, Shield, and Blade

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to create a character of any currently available class, with the exception of Cygnus Knights. Allows you to create a character with an item that will level the character up to Lv. 50 (Cygnus Knights excluded)
Can only be purchased using a character that's Lv. 50 or higher, and there must be a free character slot. After purchase, a character with an item that can level it up to Lv. 50 is created in the world where the purchase was made.
On the character screen, you will see a transparent character with the "Click" sign.
#cBe careful when using the level-up item, as SP (Skill Point) cannot be obtained if you do not do the job advancements.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to create a character of any currently available class, with the exception of Cygnus Knights. Allows you to create a character with an item that will level the character up to Lv. 100 (Cygnus Knights excluded)
Can only be purchased using a character that's Lv. 100 or higher, and there must be a free character slot. After purchase, a character with an item that can level it up to Lv. 100 is created in the world where the purchase was made.
On the character screen, you will see a transparent character with the "Click" sign.
#cBe careful when using the level-up item, as SP (Skill Point) cannot be obtained if you do not do the job advancements.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical shield that protects an item. Using this on a piece of equipment with a #cLevel 105 requirement or less# protects it from being destroyed by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection also disappears after a successful scroll use, and it #ccannot be used on items that have been successfully enhanced 12 or more times or on the superior items.# \nCan be used along with #cShield Scrolls and Guardian Scrolls#.

The protective aura also disappears after one use, even if the scroll is successful. \nCan be used along with #cShielding Wards and Guardian Scrolls#.

Available for the Equipment item with #climited wear level of 105 or below# only; can be reverted to the pre-growth state in the case of the Growth items. \nBesides, not available for the items which is being applied with c#Karma scissors type, name tag, lock of seals#. Additional options are not initialized.

string.name: desc

The protective aura also disappears after one use, even if the scroll is successful.\nCan be used along with #cShielding Wards and Shield Scrolls#.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you use a scroll after #cdragging & dropping# the Return Scroll, depending on your choice, you can restore #call of the item options to their pre-scroll valures, excluding Potentials#. However, once it is used, the effect of the Return Scroll disappears regardless of the result. \nWhen you use Return Scroll, you can only return item options that was changed by the #cscroll which deducted the number of available upgrade# and it can not be used along with #cShield Scroll#. It is restricted to use on #csupplied Tutorial Equipment Item# and some other items.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Combines potions and consumable items to refill HP & MP completely with each use.
- #cRight-click# the Potion Pot to open the genie window.
- Drag HP or MP recovery items into the item window.
- Check #cAUTOFILL# to charge the pot automatically when you loot compatible items.
- Equip to a quickslot, or to a pet's Auto HP/Auto MP Potion Pouch.
- Once expired, the pot remains in inventory.
- Use a #cRust Remover# to extend the pot's duration by 30 days.
- Use a #cPot Embiggener# to increase the pot's capacity.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use to permanently increase the Potion Pot's Storage capacity by one level(1000000). Hover your cursor over the Potion Pot's icon to view current capacity. Maximum capacity level: 9(10000000).

string.name: desc
string.value: Extends the life of an expired Potion Pot by 30 days. Only works on expired pots.

Moving the color scroll of ui, you can change the color of Rooty. \nWhen Rooty's color is changed, so would the color of the wearable #cPet Equipment#. \nIn the PC below the recommended specifications, the color of the dyed pet may not be confirmed as normal.

string.name: desc
string.value:
传说黑龙眼泪形成的保护石。强化12星以上装备前使用该道具，即获得黑龙的祝福，砸卷失败时保护装备不消失。

#c[保护成功率]#
12升13星：100%
13升14星：50%
14升15星：10%
